text: bhumiyil teattuteattu kitakkunna khandannalunt‌. muntiritteattannalum krsikalum, oru murattil ninn pala sakhannalayi valarunnatum, vere vere muratukalil ninn valarunnatumaya intappanakalum unt‌. ore vellam keantan at nanaykkappetunnat‌. phalannalute karyattil avayil cilatine marru cilatinekkal nam meccappetuttunnu. tirccayayum atil cintikkunna janannalkk drstantannalunt‌
